name: @vechain/devpal
description: A tool help building local dev environment of vechain.

scripts.build:insight: cd insight-app && npx vue-cli-service build --skip-plugins pwa && cd ..
scripts.build:inspector: cd inspector-app && npx vue-cli-service build --skip-plugins pwa && cd ..
scripts.build-sites: npm run build:insight && npm run build:inspector
scripts.copy-sites: rm -r sites/insight && rm -r sites/inspector && cp -r insight-app/dist sites/insight && cp -r inspector-app/dist sites/inspector
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run build-sites && npm run copy-sites

author: tony.li
